title: Average retail price for white sugar in Canada 2015 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, the Average retail price in CAD for 2018 have lowered. On the other hand, for 2017 the Average retail price in CAD have increased.
Month May had the maximum Average retail price in CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Average retail price in CAD was observed in Month Jul for 2019.
Among all the Months, 2018 had the highest Average retail price in CAD in Month Apr and lowest Average retail price in CAD in Month Aug.
min_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 on the X-axis.
All through the Months, the Average retail price in CAD for 2018 have lowered. On the other hand, for 2017 the Average retail price in CAD have increased.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, the Average retail price in CAD for 2018 have lowered. On the other hand, for 2017 the Average retail price in CAD have increased.
Month May had the maximum Average retail price in CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Average retail price in CAD was observed in Month Jul for 2019.
Among all the Months, 2018 had the highest Average retail price in CAD in Month Apr and lowest Average retail price in CAD in Month Aug.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Average retail price in CAD on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Over the 12 Months, the Average retail price in CAD for 2018 have been lowered whereas increased for 2017.
In Month May, 2017 had the highest Average retail price in CAD 294.0 among the 5 groups and in Jul, 2019 had the lowest Average retail price in CAD 25.0.
In Month Apr, 2018 had the highest Average retail price in CAD among all 12 Months and it has the lowest Average retail price in CAD in Month Aug.
Month Apr and Aug had the biggest gap of 244.0 between the highest and lowest Average retail price in CAD found for 2018.
Out of all 5 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Average retail price in CAD was found in case of 2016.
2017 had the maximum Average retail price in CAD out of all 5 groups in Month May followed by 2017 in May, and the minimum Average retail price in CAD is found for 2019 in Jul.
Averaging all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019, the Month Jan is the maximum Average retail price in CAD and Dec is the minimum Average retail price in CAD.
